# OCR Arcade - LLMs Context

Project: OCR Arcade
Repository: https://github.com/winterdrive/OCR-Arcade
Primary Language: TypeScript
Framework: React + Vite
Key Domains: OCR, Canvas Editing, Export

Quick Start:
- npm install
- npm run dev
- npm run build

Main Entry Points:
- src/app/main.tsx
- src/app/App.tsx

Primary Components:
- src/domains/canvas/components/CanvasArea.tsx
- src/domains/layout/components/PropertiesPanel.tsx
- src/domains/toolbar/components/SimplifiedToolbar.tsx

OCR Pipeline:
- src/domains/ocr/services/ocr.ts
- src/domains/ocr/services/OCRServiceManager.ts
- src/domains/ocr/services/imageAnalysisFacade.ts

Notes:
- This project is browser-first and supports GitHub Pages deployment.
- Route strategy uses HashRouter for static hosting compatibility.
